name: Die Hard
entries: "You really don't die, do you motherfucker?"

items: Increase your Constitution score by 1, to a maximum of 20.
You have advantage in Death Saving Throws.
When you are at 0 hit points and you regain hit points, you can spend one hit die, roll it, and regain extra hit points equal to the number rolled + your Constitution Modifier (minimum 1).

entries: FAQ: Effects that say that when you are reduced to 0 hp you drop to 1 instead, actually don't trigger this feat.
